information.name: client-zone-customization
information.description: A simple plugin to perform additional client zone customization in UCRM.
information.author: Ryan Spaeth

configuration.label: Apply Large Column Fix?
configuration.description: When enabled, the column width of the Client Zone Overview page is adjusted to full when no services exist.

configuration.label: Hide 'Is Lead' Row?
configuration.description: When enabled, the 'Is lead' row is hidden from the Client Zone Overview page.

configuration.label: Hide 'Organization' Row?
configuration.description: When enabled, the 'Organization' row is hidden from the Client Zone Overview page.

configuration.label: Custom JavaScript
configuration.description: WARNING: While nothing permanently destructive can occur form using this custom JavaScript, please be cautious.  The jQuery library is available for use here and has been re-referenced to the parent document to allow for more straight-forward selectors.
